NEW YORK
A Vision Realized

Royalton Equestrian Center

(copy TBD) In our quest to build the finest possible equestrian center, Royalton Farms has spared no expense in furnishing amenities to suit the needs of any rider. With top-flight arenas, trainers, and boarding options; the discerning aficionado need look no further.

Grand Prix Field

Hone your horse’s innate abilities and draw out their desire to perform on the Royalton Grand Prix Field. We feature jumps of only world class show quality, complemented by German Geo Textile footing, which is constantly irrigated by our innovative water cannon system.

Hunter Derby Field

Prepare for the unique challenges of Hunter Derby Courses, and bring out your horse’s true jumping style, on our very own Hunter Derby training grounds. Embrace the daring and athleticism of option obstacles, and achieve the true refinement of equestrian handiness.


Click to Tour our Fields

Indoor Arena

Ride no matter the season or weather in Royalton’s groundbreaking 3.4 acre indoor arena. It is the largest privately owned indoor arena in Long Island, and a cornerstone of Royalton’s commitment to creating the perfect equestrian center.

Pasture Turnouts

Royalton has 20 meticulously maintained grass turnouts, where your horse can walk and graze in peace. We pay the utmost attention to providing pastures with a healthy nutritional value.

Boarding at Royalton

Royalton is proud to provide a multitude of options for boarding. Our comprehensive full service boarding program is second to none, and we offer general boarding as well. Choose between our luxurious Royalton Barn, and the truly exceptional English Style at Royalton. We invite you to contact us to discuss housing your horses at Royalton Farms.

Full Service Boarding

Customize the feeding of your horse to your desire, and you can leave the rest to us. The Royalton staff will ensure that shavings, exercise, and all other daily necessities are handled like clockwork. We treat your horses as though they were our own. Coincidentally, our own horses happen to be their stablemates.

Royalton Barn

The Royalton Barn features 12×12 stalls, each with their own window, as well as four heated wash stalls; rounded out with comfortable lounge and tack rooms for the riders. The open air design exudes a timeless and rustic aura, and serves as a fine place for any equine to call home.

English Style at Royalton

The scent of fine cedar and sight of ornate wrought-iron are the first things of note upon entry to our English Style barn. The magnificence of its other qualities tends to hit home immediately after. The spacious stalls are a lovely open design, and each features a fan system, as well as a camera which is viewable via live feed, twenty-four hours a day. The English Style barn also houses two heated brick wash stalls, as well as a fully climate controlled, and lavishly furnished, tack room.

Our Trainers

With a full time staff of veteran trainers, including an Olympian rider, Royalton is qualified to prepare your horses for the highest levels of competition. Allow us to introduce you to our team.
